titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to revise disproportionate share hospital payments under the Medicaid Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Reported by the Committee on Energy and Commerce. H. Rept. 107-547.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 328.

bill.summary: 6/26/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to revise disproportionate share hospital (DSH) payments under the Medicaid program, increasing DSH allotments for FY 2003 and beyond.
